programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: A Hero Ain't Nothing But a Sandwich

programme.title: Inferno Canibal
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes ativistas viaja até à Amazónia para salvar a floresta tropical. Mas rapidamente descobre que não estão ali sozinhos e que nenhuma boa ação fica impune...

programme.title: Duplo Amor
programme.desc: Leonard regressa a casa dos pais que, bem-intencionados, o empurram na direção da filha dos vizinhos de longa data. Leonard deixa-se levar, até ao dia em que repara na deslumbrante Michelle, a mulher que se muda para o apartamento em frente, pago por um homem casado.

programme.title: Cliente de Risco
programme.desc: Mick Haller, um advogado criminal de Los Angeles, usa o seu carro como escritório. A rotina de trabalho passa por atender clientes e defender pequenas causas, até que surge o grande desafio da sua carreira: defender um playboy de Beverly Hills, que foi acusado de violação e tentativa de homicídio.

programme.title: Mamã
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira tenta sustentar-se a si e ao filho, de 15 anos, que sofre de Perturbação de Hiperatividade e Défice de Atenção. Quando a nova e peculiar vizinha se oferece para a ajudar, encontram um novo sentido de equilíbrio e esperança.

programme.title: USS Indianapolis: Homens de Coragem
programme.desc: Em julho de 1945, o navio de guerra USS Indianapolis entregou, secretamente, uma das duas bombas atómicas que viriam a pôr fim ao conflito. Atacado pelo Japão, o navio naufragou e a tripulação viu-se presa em águas infestadas de tubarões.

programme.title: A Comuna
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, o casal Erik e Anna realiza um sonho e, juntamente com a filha, monta uma comuna em Copenhaga. Há amizade, amor e vida em conjunto debaixo do mesmo teto, até que um devastador caso de amor sujeita a comuna ao seu maior teste.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: When Life Gives You Lemon Bars

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

programme.title: Um Dia Perfeito
programme.desc: Uma equipa de ajuda humanitária tenta resolver uma crise numa zona onde decorre um conflito armado. Humor, drama, emoção, rotina, perigo e esperança: tudo cabe num dia perfeito.

programme.title: Cliente de Risco
programme.desc: Mick Haller, um advogado criminal de Los Angeles, usa o seu carro como escritório. A rotina de trabalho passa por atender clientes e defender pequenas causas, até que surge o grande desafio da sua carreira: defender um playboy de Beverly Hills, que foi acusado de violação e tentativa de homicídio.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Um realizador não consegue contratar uma atriz para o próximo filme, porque ninguém aceita filmar num lugar não revelado. É Ann Darrow, então desempregada, que acompanha a equipa de produção até uma ilha desconhecida, onde habita um gigantesco macaco, que o grupo pretende levar para Nova Iorque.

programme.title: O Senhor Babadook
programme.desc: Uma mãe, atormentada pela morte violenta do marido, luta contra o medo noturno que o filho tem de um monstro. Mas rapidamente descobre que uma presença sinistra se esconde na sua casa.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.title: Dá e Leva
programme.desc: Daniel Lugo, Adrian Doorbal e Paul Doyle são três personal trainers de Miami. Em comum, o trio tem o facto de se sentir insatisfeito com a vida que leva. Os três decidem raptar Victor Kershaw, um dos mais ricos empresários da cidade, mas o sonho não corre como planeado...

programme.title: Baby Driver: Alta Velocidade
programme.desc: Baby, um jovem condutor especialista em fugas de assaltos, confia na sua banda sonora para ser o melhor. Ao encontrar a miúda dos seus sonhos, Baby pensa em deixar a vida do crime. Mas terá de optar pela música certa quando um golpe põe tudo em risco.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Um ano após os eventos relatados no primeiro filme, em que arrebataram o público ao mesmo tempo que conseguiram enganar o FBI, os Quatro Cavaleiros regressam aos palcos.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: A Cidade Perdida de Z
programme.desc: A história do explorador inglês Percy Fawcett que, no início do século XX, descobre na Amazónia provas de uma civilização desconhecida. Ridicularizado pela comunidade científica, Fawcett regressa para provar a teoria, mas desaparece misteriosamente.

programme.title: Réplicas
programme.desc: William Foster, um neurocientista genial, está prestes a fazer uma grande descoberta ao nível da consciência humana, quando a sua família morre num trágico acidente. Desesperado para ressuscitar aqueles que perdeu, William tenta criar réplicas.

programme.title: O Herói de Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond Doss foi o único soldado americano que, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, lutou na frente de batalha sem estar armado, acreditando que matar era errado. Como médico do Exército, evacuou, sozinho, os feridos que tinham ficado em território inimigo.

programme.title: Entre Dois Fogos
programme.desc: Um ex-polícia vai parar inadvertidamente no meio de uma disputa brutal entre o FBI e o submundo de Chicago.

programme.title: Terra de Minas
programme.desc: Na Dinamarca, após a Segunda Guerra Mundial, um grupo de prisioneiros de guerra alemães é forçado a limpar uma praia de milhares de minas terrestres, debaixo da vigilância de um sargento dinamarquês. No entanto, aos poucos, este cria laços com o jovem grupo.

programme.title: Pânico no Túnel
programme.desc: O pânico instala-se quando, num túnel de Nova Iorque, há um desmoronamento na ligação entre Manhattan e Nova Jérsia, na sequência de uma explosão. Entretanto, um homem lidera as pessoas presas no interior e tenta que todos consigam sair em segurança.

programme.title: Submarino U-571
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a Marinha americana combate um submarino alemão com o intuito de lhes roubar um descodificador secreto.

programme.title: O Ben Está de Volta
programme.desc: Ben Burns é um jovem toxicodependente em tratamento, que regressa a casa, inesperadamente, na véspera de Natal. A mãe recebe-o de braços abertos, mas, durante 24 turbulentas horas, ela fará de tudo para evitar que Ben tenha uma recaída...

programme.title: Jackie Chan nas Ruas de Nova York
programme.desc: Keung é um agente da polícia de Hong Kong que viaja até Nova Iorque para assistir ao casamento do tio. Mas quando um gangue de bandidos se muda para a vizinhança e começa a pedir dinheiro aos lojistas da zona, Keung vê-se forçado a lutar contra o gangue e a utilizar artes marciais.

programme.title: Engana-me Que Eu Gosto
programme.desc: Danny, solteiro e um cirurgião plástico bem-sucedido, usa um estratagema de engate muito pouco convencional: diz que é casado, evitando assim envolvimentos mais profundos. Isto até se apaixonar por Palmer. No entanto, infelizmente, a rapariga julga que ele é casado.

programme.title: Uns Pais do Pior
programme.desc: Frank e Nancy levam a sua única filha à faculdade e quando regressam a casa, num bairro da classe alta, constatam que as suas poupanças diminuem rapidamente. Recorrem então a medidas extremas para esconder a sua situação e manter as aparências...

programme.title: Diário Secreto de Um Caçador de Vampiros
programme.desc: Abraham Lincoln, o 16º Presidente dos Estados Unidos da América, não é um homem comum. Ainda jovem, descobriu que a sua mãe e avô morreram vítimas de um ataque de vampiros, pelo que decidiu dedicar-se à sua caça e extermínio: tornou-se um caçador de vampiros.

programme.title: Soldado Destino
programme.desc: Antes de John McCain ser candidato à presidência dos EUA, pilotou bombardeiros no Vietname. Após o seu avião ser atingido, torna-se recluso na célebre prisão conhecida como Hanoi Hilton. Durante anos, ele passa por um inferno, mas não lhe conseguem roubar a sua honra, a nenhum custo.

programme.title: Martin e Lewis
programme.desc: A história da relação conturbada de 10 anos entre Dean Martin e Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: Encontro Inesquecível
programme.desc: Um charmoso executivo tem um encontro às cegas com uma jovem, uma vez que precisa de levar companhia ao jantar de negócios da empresa. No entanto, a mulher tem um problema: perde totalmente o controlo quando bebe álcool!

programme.title: A Luz Entre Oceanos
programme.desc: O casal Tom e Isabel vive feliz numa ilha na costa da Austrália, após a Primeira Guerra Mundial. O maior desejo deles é trazerem uma criança ao mundo, mas, após Isabel abortar, perdem a esperança. Certo dia, o casal resgata uma menina que deu à costa num barco e decidem adotá-la como sua filha.

programme.title: Antes de Adormecer
programme.desc: Christine acorda todos os dias sem memória do seu passado, depois de um acidente traumático. Por seu lado, o marido apresenta-se e explica-lhe a vida que têm em conjunto. No entanto, quando ela questiona aquilo que lhe é dito, novas verdades emergem e tudo parece suspeito.

programme.title: Comando
programme.desc: John Matrix, ex-militar, levava uma vida tranquila com a sua filha. Contudo, um grupo de mercenários raptou-a e John fará de tudo para a recuperar. O seu plano passa por fingir colaborar com eles, para depois os eliminar um a um.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Aposta de Solteiros
programme.desc: Sete amigos fazem uma aposta: o que se casar por último leva todo o dinheiro. Um deles apaixona-se de facto pela rapariga que contratou para isco.

programme.title: Collide - A Alta Velocidade
programme.desc: Depois de um assalto correr mal, Casey Stein é obrigado a fugir de um gangue cruel, que tudo fará para recuperar os seus bens valiosos. Sem opções e para proteger a namorada, Casey envolve-se numa louca perseguição pelas autoestradas de Munique.

programme.title: Parasitas
programme.desc: Ki-taek tem uma família unida, mas estão todos desempregados e sem perspetivas. O filho Ki-woo é recomendado para dar explicações bem pagas na casa dos Park, o que vem desencadear a esperança de um rendimento e provocar uma série de incidentes.

programme.title: Entre Dois Fogos
programme.desc: Um ex-polícia vai parar inadvertidamente no meio de uma disputa brutal entre o FBI e o submundo de Chicago.

programme.title: A Rapariga No Comboio
programme.desc: Rachel fantasia com a vida aparentemente perfeita de um casal, que vive do outro lado da linha do comboio que apanha diariamente. Quando, da janela, observa algo que a perturba, vê-se envolvida na investigação de uma pessoa desaparecida...

programme.title: A Luz Entre Oceanos
programme.desc: O casal Tom e Isabel vive feliz numa ilha na costa da Austrália, após a Primeira Guerra Mundial. O maior desejo deles é trazerem uma criança ao mundo, mas, após Isabel abortar, perdem a esperança. Certo dia, o casal resgata uma menina que deu à costa num barco e decidem adotá-la como sua filha.

programme.title: 13 Fantasmas
programme.desc: Arthur Kriticos e os seus dois filhos, Kathy e Bobby, perderam tudo. Um incêndio levou-lhes Jean, a mãe e esposa, assim como todos os seus bens. Inesperadamente, Arthur recebe a herança do excêntrico tio Cyrus. Mas a herança traz uma desagradável surpresa no bico.

programme.title: S.I.S. - Força de Elite
programme.desc: A Divisão de Investigações Especiais, uma força policial secreta de elite, captura criminosos nas ruas de Los Angeles.

programme.title: Dinheiro Quente
programme.desc: Seth Davis desistiu da faculdade, mas, para tentar viver à altura dos padrões de exigência do pai, arranja emprego como corretor numa empresa de investimento e começa rapidamente a ter sucesso. Só que nesse emprego nem tudo é tão legal como parece.

programme.title: Jogo Limpo
programme.desc: A agente Valerie Plame descobre que o Iraque não possui um programa de armas nucleares. O marido, Joe, é enviado para África a fim de investigar rumores da comercialização de urânio. Ao descobrir que tais negócios nunca existiram, Joe escreve um artigo que despoleta uma tempestade de controvérsia.

programme.title: Mar de Chamas
programme.desc: Dois irmãos bombeiros, que não gostam um do outro, vão ter que trabalhar juntos para apanhar um incendiário criminoso.

programme.title: Amigos Coloridos
programme.desc: Jamie, uma executiva de recursos humanos, tenta convencer um potencial candidato, Dylan, a mudar-se para Nova Iorque. Apesar da atração mútua, depressa chegam à conclusão de que representam tudo aquilo que sempre quiseram evitar numa relação. Por isso, decidem ser apenas amigos... coloridos.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE3ZTYxZWYtMjQ1Ny00MzFhLWI1MGMtMDZmMzYwYjc1OWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Supermanfan-13"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!","reviewBody":"I never read the Outlander books so I didn't really know what to expect. programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sede de Matar
programme.desc: Quinze anos depois do assassinato do noivo, Hailey Dean trabalha com o irmão dele, o detetive Danny Morgan, com o detetive Fincher e o colega de faculdade Clyde para finalmente resolver o caso.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Morte em Serviço
programme.desc: Hailey Dean ajuda o melhor amigo e investigador do Ministério Público, Fincher Garland, a lidar com o homicídio inesperado de um amigo, Kurt Cullen, com quem serviu nos Marines.

programme.title: A Idade de Adaline
programme.desc: Depois de, miraculosamente, ter ficado com 29 anos durante quase oito décadas, Adaline Bowman leva uma vida solitária. No entanto, um encontro casual com um jovem e carismático filantropo reacende a sua paixão pela vida e pelo amor.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Le Chien Est Le Meilleur Ami de L'Homme

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: C'Est La Goutte D'Eau Qui Fait Déborder Le Vase

programme.title: A Outra Bolena
programme.desc: As duas irmãs Bolena são incitadas pelo pai a reforçar a posição social da família, pela conquista de favores do rei de Inglaterra. Inicialmente, Mary torna-se amante do rei e tem um filho ilegítimo. Mas Anne consegue afastar tanto a irmã como a mulher do rei, com um único objetivo: ser rainha.

programme.title: Guerra de Casamentos
programme.desc: Depois de um organizador de festas gay descobrir que o irmão está por trás do discurso do governador contra o casamento entre homossexuais, decide fazer greve para exigir direitos iguais.

programme.title: These Old Broads
programme.desc: Elas juraram nunca voltar a trabalhar juntas, mas quando se reúnem novamente voltam a ter ataques de fúria, a roubar manchetes e a deixar os produtores em lágrimas!

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Morte em Serviço
programme.desc: Hailey Dean ajuda o melhor amigo e investigador do Ministério Público, Fincher Garland, a lidar com o homicídio inesperado de um amigo, Kurt Cullen, com quem serviu nos Marines.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Receita para Matar
programme.desc: A psicóloga e antiga procuradora Hailey Dean ajuda o seu amigo, o detetive Fincher Garland, a investigar uma crescente vaga de homicídios no hospital Atlanta Memorial, quando a namorada de Fincher, a médica Meghan Phillips, é considerada suspeita do primeiro homicídio.

programme.title: Peggy Sue Casou-se
programme.desc: Peggy Sue é uma mulher de meia-idade, deprimida pela sua recenté separação com o marido. Na festa do 25º aniversário da sua graduação escolar, reúne-se com os antigos companheiros, que lhe contam como vai a vida de cada um.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: L'Enfer Est Pavé de Bonnes Intentions

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: A La Guerre Comme à La Guerre

programme.title: Ligações Perigosas
programme.desc: Na França libertina do século XVIII, a Marquesa de Morteuil desafia o seu ex-amante, o Visconde de Valmont, a seduzir Madame de Tourvel, uma bela mulher, casada e temente a Deus. Ambos iniciam assim um perigoso jogo de seduções e enganos.

programme.title: Dizem Por Aí...
programme.desc: Sarah Huttinger concordou em casar, mas está apavorada com a ideia. A sua carreira de jornalista estagnou na página de obituário do New York Times. A sua irmã Annie decidiu casar-se com o parceiro de ténis e Sarah vai ter que assistir ao enlace, o que significa passar tempo com a sua família...

programme.title: Underworld - O Submundo
programme.desc: Numa guerra que dura há séculos, longe do olhar dos humanos, os vampiros e os lobisomens lutam pela supremacia do Submundo. Mas tudo muda quando os lobisomens planeiam raptar um jovem médico humano para criar uma nova espécie. Apenas Selene, uma guerreira vampira, poderá impedir este plano.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Sofia é uma acompanhante de luxo que trabalha em casa e apresenta-se aos clientes como Manuela. Jano é seu cliente e apresenta-se como Hugo. Quem são Sofia e Jano? Nenhum deles é quem parece ser...

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: O Jantar
programme.desc: Dois casais reúnem-se num restaurante de luxo para decidir o que fazer em relação a um crime que os filhos de ambos cometeram: deixá-los sofrer as consequências e passar por um sistema penal que os marcará para sempre ou fechar os olhos e validar um comportamento inaceitável?

programme.title: Tanner Hall
programme.desc: Um olhar sobre o mundo privado de um colégio interno de raparigas, em Nova Inglaterra. Através das histórias de quatro jovens, o complexo mundo das adolescentes é desvendado.

programme.title: A Poeira do Tempo
programme.desc: Em Los Angeles, em 1933, Camilla é uma mexicana que espera subir de vida casando com um americano rico, e Arturo um aspirante a escritor que sonha apaixonar-se por uma loura e escrever uma obra-prima em redor disso. Mas quando se conhecem, todos os seus planos vão levar uma reviravolta.

programme.title: Os Profissionais do Jogo
programme.desc: Um trio de vigaristas tenta enfrentar um lendário jogador de poker e acaba por ser perseguido por um gangster vingativo.

programme.title: Derradeira Viagem
programme.desc: Trinta anos após servirem juntos no Vietname, um grupo de ex-colegas reencontra-se. Um antigo enfermeiro da Marinha reúne-se com dois velhos amigos fuzileiros, Sal Nealon e o agora Reverendo Richard Mueller, para enterrar o seu filho, um jovem fuzileiro morto na guerra do Iraque.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A história verídica do ataque terrorista ao Hotel Taj, em Mumbai. O staff do hotel arriscou as suas vidas para manter toda a gente segura e também as outras pessoas fizeram sacrifícios impensáveis para se protegerem a si e às suas famílias.

programme.title: Evereste
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de uma expedição ao cume do Evereste, que terminou em tragédia. Os alpinistas foram apanhados de surpresa por uma violenta tempestade de neve.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado 2
programme.desc: O casamento de Sherman Klump, um professor obeso, com a sua colega Denise é comprometido pelos resultados desastrosos das suas experiências genéticas.

programme.title: O Caloiro na Máfia
programme.desc: Um rapaz inocente e um mafioso experiente? Este pode ser o início de uma bela amizade! Clark, um estudante "caloiro" de cinema, conhece Carmine Sabatini, um criminoso estranhamente parecido com o "Padrinho" do mundo do cinema, e vê-se envolvido com a família deste.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: Um músico, "o mariachi", quer vingar a morte da sua namorada e a mutilação de uma das suas mãos. Para isso, regressa à cidade onde tudo aconteceu. Ali, conhece uma bela mulher que trabalha para um dos distribuidores de droga locais, vendo-se de novo envolvido num sangrento confronto.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: Becky é uma adolescente rebelde, que durante umas férias de família irá viver a pior experiência da sua vida. Isto quando a casa onde se encontram é invadida por um grupo de reclusos em fuga, liderado pelo impiedoso Dominick...

programme.title: Underworld: Evolução
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, combate um poderoso congénere que decide aliar-se ao seu irmão lobisomem para dominar o mundo das criaturas da noite.

programme.title: O Próximo a Abater
programme.desc: Após matarem dois membros da máfia russa em autodefesa, dois irmãos, católicos e irlandeses, tornam-se vigilantes e começam a eliminar os criminosos do submundo de Boston em nome de Deus.

programme.title: O Culpado
programme.desc: Asger Holm, operador de central de emergências, atende a chamada de uma mulher raptada. Mas quando o telefonema é subitamente interrompido, Asger inicia uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar esta mulher de uma situação que pode ser mais complexa...

programme.title: Paterson
programme.desc: Paterson é um motorista que conduz o mesmo turno do autocarro 23. Escuta as conversas dos seus passageiros, observa como interagem, como se movimentam e como respiram. Nas horas vagas, escreve poemas sobre os dias iguais que vive.

programme.title: K-Pax - Um Homem do Outro Mundo
programme.desc: Prot é um paciente de um hospício que diz ser oriundo de um planeta longínquo, K-Pax. Só que quando o seu psiquiatra procura a melhor forma de o ajudar, começa a perceber que o dito extraterrestre possui poderes misteriosos sobre a saúde mental dos outros doentes.

programme.title: Evereste
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de uma expedição ao cume do Evereste, que terminou em tragédia. Os alpinistas foram apanhados de surpresa por uma violenta tempestade de neve.

programme.title: Berlin, I Love You
programme.desc: Depois de Paris, Nova Iorque e Rio de Janeiro, é a vez de Berlim ser a capital do amor no cinema. Uma dezena de histórias românticas com a fabulosa cidade alemã como pano de fundo.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado 2
programme.desc: O casamento de Sherman Klump, um professor obeso, com a sua colega Denise é comprometido pelos resultados desastrosos das suas experiências genéticas.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens intergaláticos interpretam imagens de videojogos clássicos como declarações de guerra e a Terra é atacada. Agora, cabe a um ex-campeão de jogos da década de 80 liderar uma equipa de jogadores da velha guarda, derrotar os aliens e salvar o planeta.

programme.title: Uma Casa Cheia
programme.desc: Alice Kinney decide começar uma nova vida com as duas filhas em Los Angeles. Tudo parece estar a entrar nos eixos até ela conhecer Teddy, Zoey e Harry, que precisam de um lugar para morar. Alice concorda em dar-lhes guarida, nunca imaginando que, contra todas as probabilidades, acabaria apaixonada.

programme.title: A Herdade
programme.desc: A saga de uma família proprietária de um dos maiores latifúndios da Europa, na margem sul do Tejo, convida-nos a mergulhar profundamente nos segredos da sua herdade. A partir dela, faz-se o retrato de Portugal, dos anos 40, atravessando a revolução do 25 de Abril e até aos dias de hoje.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga 3
programme.desc: Ray Breslin e Trent DeRosa juntam-se a Hush para resgatar um dos membros da equipa. Este foi feito refém numa prisão conhecida como Estação do Diabo, local de onde ninguém consegue escapar...

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: Planeta dos Macacos: A Guerra
programme.desc: César e os seus companheiros são forçados a entrar num confronto mortal com um exército de humanos, liderados por um Coronel implacável. Depois de sofrer perdas inimagináveis, César luta com os seus instintos mais obscuros para vingar a sua espécie.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="
