IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324","dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: FBI: Most Wanted: Created by Rene Balcer. With Julian McMahon, Roxy Sternberg, Kellan Lutz, Keisha Castle-Hughes. It follows the division of the FBI tasked with tracking and capturing the notorious criminals on the FBI's Most Wanted list." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt9742936/","name":"FBI: Most Wanted","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWE5ZmZmOTgtYzI0YS00ZDY4LWFiZmItMGVmYWZjMjlkMTYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NjcwNTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"It follows the division of the FBI tasked with tracking and capturing the notorious criminals on the FBI's Most Wanted list.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9742936/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rlebovich-88908"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has potential","reviewBody":"Looking for a new cop show. So far it has my attention. You can't make a decision on the pilot. The only part that bothered me was the mention of Optic Neuritis as an eye infection treatable with medicine. Well that's NOT true, it's a sign one has MS. I know because I had 2 bouts & I have MS. programme.desc:
Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Minha Vida Dava um Crime
A Minha Vida Dava um Crime
Grey's Anatomy
Anatomia de Grey
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! programme.title: Murder In The Vineyard
programme.desc: Emma e a sua filha, Beatrice, mudam-se de uma grande cidade para uma mais pequena. A carreira de Emma vai de vento em popa e Beatrice faz amigos com facilidade, chegando mesmo a chamar a atenção de Bryan, o galã da escola. Contudo, as coisas descambam quando Emma é ameaçada por um desconhecido.

programme.title: Secrets That Kill
programme.desc: Carrie não está satisfeita quando a mãe volta de um cruzeiro com um marido mais jovem, Reed. Quando Grace fica em coma e a governanta de longa data da família acaba morta, as suspeitas de Carrie em relação a Reed intensificam-se. Porém, tem de investigar a história da sua família mais a fundo.

programme.sub-title: The Only Way Out Is Through

programme.sub-title: Sorry Doesn't Always Make It Right
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flip That Romance
programme.desc: No início da Primavera, dois decoradores rivais encontram-se a renovar os dois lados de um duplex. Enquanto tentam superar-se um ao outro a toda a hora, a chama de um romance antigo reacende-se a cada passo da renovação.

programme.title: Killer In My Home
programme.desc: O mundo perfeito de Allison Winters desaba quando o marido morre na sequência de um ataque cardíaco. Mas não esperava que ele revelasse, no leito de morte, que tem uma família secreta. Seis meses depois, Jenna e Joshua aparecem à porta de Allison, determinados a fazer parte da vida dela e da filha.

programme.title: Valentine Ever After
programme.desc: Duas raparigas de Chicago, que fazem uma saída de fim de semana a um rancho em Wyoming, são forçadas a ficar na localidade na sequência de uma rixa num bar local. Isto porque são condenadas a cumprir trabalho comunitário por conduta desordeira.

programme.sub-title: What Can Happen in the Dark

programme.title: Love, Romance & Chocolate
programme.desc: Emma e Luc competem pelo lugar de melhor chocolateiro, na Bélgica. A beleza e o romantismo da cidade de Bruges inspiram as melhores criações e combinações de chocolate. Será que os corações dos dois rivais conseguem resistir à competição?

programme.title: Pretty Cheaters, Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Depois de se ver envolvida numa situação comprometedora, Hannah Fletcher, no último ano do secundário, acha que pode parar a chantagem da prima Madison ao fazer o exame de acesso à universidade por ela. No entanto, Madison nunca está satisfeita e os seus planos rapidamente se tornam mortais...

programme.title: Sorority Secrets
programme.desc: Cassie fica entusiasmada quando é aceite a meio do ano numa residência universitária de elite. Contudo, quando descobre que a presidente do clube universitário e a sua conselheira gerem um serviço de acompanhantes com raparigas da residência, Cassie percebe que este "pequeno segredo" pode matá-la.

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Anatomia de Grey
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Last Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Após ter ido a nove casamentos, Becca Foster parece não conseguir passar de dama de honor a noiva. Está quase a chegar a sua décima cerimónia e a sua prima Lucie espera que haja química entre ela e o padrinho do noivo. Porém, há outro homem na equação: Kyle Taylor, que vai filmar o casamento.

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You
programme.desc: Riley não quer mais nada além de reestabelecer laços com a mãe e a irmã mais nova, que estão confinadas devido à doença da irmã. Porém, quando Riley percebe que a irmã poderá não estar, afinal, tão doente como parece, a mãe de Riley não olhará a meios para manter as filhas com ela para sempre.

programme.title: Valentine In The Vineyard
programme.desc: Entre os planos do casamento da prima de Frankie, Lexi, e do irmão de Nate, Marco, e a expansão da sua adega, Frankie e Nate começam a pensar se as diferenças entre os dois não poderão ser um obstáculo maior do que o que previram, colocando em risco a sua amada adega e a sua relação.

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy

programme.title: Over The Moon In Love
programme.desc: Com o seu negócio de namoros online à beira do fim, Brooklyn tem a oportunidade de aparecer numa revista e tentar salvar o seu negócio. Mas primeiro vai ter de juntar a jornalista que vai escrever o artigo com o seu amigo de infância, Devin.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Tubarão 2
programme.desc: O terror está longe de acabar! Os banhistas de Amity são, uma vez mais, ameaçados por um gigante tubarão devorador de pessoas. Quando sinais de um novo apreciador de carne humana começam a surgir, o xerife Brody tem de convencer a cidade do perigo que corre, assim como matar o monstro.

programme.title: A Coisa
programme.desc: Em 1982, Kate Lloyd, uma paleontóloga americana, é recrutada por uma equipa de cientistas noruegueses a trabalhar na Antárctica. Aí é informada de uma descoberta revolucionária: uma nave alienígena que se terá despenhado, há mais de 100 mil anos, contendo uma criatura congelada, aparentemente morta.

programme.title: Balbúrdia no Oeste
programme.desc: O caminho de ferro irá atravessar a pachorrenta cidade Rock Ridge e as suas terras valerão uma fortuna. Mas como é que alguém afugenta os donos daquelas terras? A solução é enviar o pior, mais duro e implacável bando de homens que houver...

programme.title: Os Sete Magníficos
programme.desc: Uma aldeia que está a ser aterrorizada por um grupo de bandidos decide contratar um pistoleiro para defender a população. Os habitantes acabam por conseguir sete, sendo que cada um tem diferentes razões para os querer defender.

programme.title: O Regresso dos 7 Magníficos
programme.desc: Dois sobreviventes do grupo inicial "Os Sete Magníficos", Chris e Vin, recrutam quatro novos membros para defender uma cidade sitiada por foras da lei.

programme.title: Um Homem
programme.desc: Uns passageiros são atacados por bandidos que pretendem roubar o dinheiro transportado por um agente da reserva Faver. Felizmente, entre os passageiros, viaja John Russell, criado por Apaches e conhecido como "Hombre", que se torna na única hipótese de sobrevivência dos passageiros.

programme.title: 100 Armas ao Sol
programme.desc: O índio Joe Herrera planeia assaltar um banco para conseguir o dinheiro que necessita para armar o seu povo, oprimido por um chefe local. No México, alia-se a um xerife que o ajuda na luta para libertar e devolver a dignidade roubada aos índios.

programme.title: Bandolero!
programme.desc: Mace chega à cidade com a intenção de libertar um grupo de rebeldes da prisão, onde também está o irmão. Na fuga, são perseguidos até ao México, onde depois, apesar de terem feitios e vidas diferentes, se juntam na luta contra marginais mexicanos.

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp e o seu amigo Doc Holliday combatem um bando de criminosos que assolam a cidade de Tombstone.

programme.title: O Desafio dos Campeões
programme.desc: Billy Robinson tornou-se um craque do circuito profissional de motociclismo. Mas quando regressa à sua cidade natal para participar numa corrida local, vai ter de competir com o melhor amigo, Rick, para o prémio principal.

programme.title: Nascido Rebelde
programme.desc: O exército americano contrata um motoqueiro delinquente para treinar o seu novo esquadrão para uma missão importante.

programme.title: Os Cavaleiros da Lenda
programme.desc: Um grupo de reconstituição medieval acha cada vez mais difícil manter o seu grupo familiar unido, com a pressão da polícia local, o interesse de agentes de entretenimento e um crescente sentimento de loucura do seu líder.

programme.title: O Vingador da Estrada
programme.desc: Um fazendeiro do Arkansas dá início a uma guerra de um homem só contra promotores imobiliários corruptos que querem despejá-lo e aos seus vizinhos das suas fazendas para construir empreendimentos.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa baía da Califórnia, comemora-se o centenário do naufrágio de um veleiro, em que morreram todos os tripulantes. Agora, o mesmo nevoeiro trará de novo a morte.

programme.title: Chisum, o Senhor do Oeste
programme.desc: Chisum construiu um império de gado enquanto lutava contra ladrões de gado, doenças, índios e a própria terra. Porém, um especulador e um xerife corrupto ameaçam tudo aquilo que tanto lhe custou a ganhar. Agora, para salvar o seu império, Chisum pede a ajuda do duo mais infame do faroeste.

programme.title: Os Sete Magníficos
programme.desc: Uma aldeia que está a ser aterrorizada por um grupo de bandidos decide contratar um pistoleiro para defender a população. Os habitantes acabam por conseguir sete, sendo que cada um tem diferentes razões para os querer defender.

programme.title: O Regresso dos 7 Magníficos
programme.desc: Dois sobreviventes do grupo inicial "Os Sete Magníficos", Chris e Vin, recrutam quatro novos membros para defender uma cidade sitiada por foras da lei.

programme.title: Duelo ao Sol
programme.desc: A bela mestiça Pearl Chavez vê-se no meio de uma disputa entre dois irmãos, um bom e o outro mau.

programme.title: Balbúrdia no Oeste
programme.desc: O caminho de ferro irá atravessar a pachorrenta cidade Rock Ridge e as suas terras valerão uma fortuna. Mas como é que alguém afugenta os donos daquelas terras? A solução é enviar o pior, mais duro e implacável bando de homens que houver...

programme.title: Chefes Intragáveis 2
programme.desc: Fartos dos seus chefes, Nick, Dale e Kurt decidem abrir um negócio. No entanto, um investidor sem escrúpulos puxa-lhes o 'tapete'. Desesperados e sem qualquer hipótese, os três candidatos a empresários decidem sequestrar o filho do investidor e pedir um resgate!

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Agora que Ted se juntou à sensual Tami-Lynn, ele quer constituir família e ter filhos. O problema será encontrar um dador e provar em tribunal que não é um mero urso de peluche e que está qualificado para ser pai.

programme.title: Uns Compadres do Pior
programme.desc: Durante um fim de semana em casa dos sogros, Greg Focker perde a bagagem e o gato, e ainda consegue provocar um incêndio. Quatro anos mais tarde, tem finalmente a confiança do sogro, bem como uma data de casamento. Mas a última prova é voltar a passar um fim de semana com eles sem fazer estragos.

programme.title: Tracers - Nos Limites
programme.desc: Cam faz o que pode para pagar as suas dívidas. No entanto, a sua vida muda quando choca de bicicleta com Nikki, uma jovem complicada que o seduz para o perigoso mundo do parkour.

programme.title: Missão Impossível
programme.desc: Durante uma missão arriscada em Praga, um grupo de agentes de uma organização chamada IMF (Impossible Mission Force) cai numa emboscada. Apenas Ethan Hunt e outra agente sobrevivem, mas Ethan tem de enfrentar a acusação de ser o informador e de ter sido o responsável pelo falhanço da missão.

programme.title: Missão Impossível II
programme.desc: Como se impede que terroristas espalhem o caos? Este é um trabalho para o agente secreto Ethan Hunt da Impossible Mission Force (IMF). Ethan foi enviado para destruir uma doença, "Quimera", criada geneticamente. A sua missão torna-se impossível, pois ele não é a única pessoa atrás das amostras!

programme.title: Nascido Rebelde
programme.desc: O exército americano contrata um motoqueiro delinquente para treinar o seu novo esquadrão para uma missão importante.

programme.title: The Beach Bum: A Vida Numa Boa
programme.desc: As escandalosas aventuras de Moondog, um espírito livre permanentemente sob o efeito de álcool ou drogas, cujo lema é viver a vida pelas suas próprias regras.

programme.title: Tribos
programme.desc: Num aterrador mundo apocalíptico habitado por gangues divididos por tribos mortais, um casal tenta, desesperadamente, atravessar o país em busca de segurança. No entanto, no caminho são levados ao limite.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro, amargurado com a vida, tenta reaproximar-se do seu pai distante, enquanto a sua comunidade é cercada por "caçadores" de terras.

programme.title: Renegados
programme.desc: Uma equipa de Navy Seals ignora ordens superiores para ajudar a população do local onde se encontram, na Bósnia. Mas uma mortífera reviravolta leva a que a equipa seja detetada pelo inimigo, o que lhes dá apenas 10 horas para completarem a sua missão.

programme.title: Mr. Bean em Férias
programme.desc: Numa Inglaterra chuvosa, Mr. Bean fica delirante ao descobrir que acabou de ganhar umas magníficas férias no sul de França. Mas onde quer que vá, como seria de esperar, Mr. Bean semeia o caos e a destruição, transformando tudo numa animação. Está sempre a um passo do desastre!

programme.title: O Homem dos Punhos de Ferro
programme.desc: Uma aldeia chinesa serve de palco a guerras violentas entre vários clãs. O guerreiro X-Blade procura vingar a morte do seu pai e une forças com um mercenário e um ferreiro, com dons especiais, para derrotar os clãs inimigos.

programme.title: Os Condenados de Shawshank
programme.desc: Baseado num conto de Stephen King, este surpreendente drama acompanha os vinte anos de detenção de um banqueiro, aparentemente inocente, condenado a prisão perpétua pelo duplo homicídio da mulher e do seu amante, e da sua amizade com um recluso negro, rei dos golpes e cínico militante sem ilusões.

programme.title: Os Últimos Na Terra
programme.desc: Após uma guerra nuclear, uma jovem mulher sobrevive sozinha, temendo ser a proverbial última mulher na Terra. Mas tudo muda quando tem a visão mais surpreendente da sua vida: outro ser humano.

programme.title: Blindado
programme.desc: Um jovem guarda tem de vigiar uma carrinha blindada e, forçado pelos seus problemas económicos, decide aceitar a oferta dos seus veteranos para roubar as carrinhas, que contêm 42 milhões de dólares. No entanto, uma mudança de planos de última hora divide o grupo.

programme.title: Encontro em Manhattan
programme.desc: Num hotel luxuoso de Manhattan, um candidato ao Senado apaixona-se por uma criada que se faz passar por uma abonada cliente.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes
programme.desc: Em 1947, um envelhecido e retirado Sherlock Holmes lança um olhar sobre a sua vida e relembra as circunstâncias do caso não resolvido que o obrigou a reformar-se, procurando respostas para os mistérios da vida e do amor, antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Sem Escape - Vencer ou Morrer
programme.desc: Sam Gillen, um preso que fugiu e anda escondido das autoridades, consegue sempre estar no local errado, mas na altura certa. Arriscando a sua liberdade, Sam vai ajudar Clydie, uma jovem viúva, e os seus filhos. Estes enfrentam um impiedoso homem de negócios que tenta pô-los fora das suas terras.

programme.title: Álamo
programme.desc: Em 1838, 200 colonos americanos refugiam-se no forte Álamo, onde se veem cercados e atacados durante 12 dias pelo exército mexicano.

programme.title: O Sobrevivente
programme.desc: Numa missão dos SEAL com o objetivo de capturar ou matar o famoso líder talibã Ahmad Shahd, quatro operacionais são apanhados numa emboscada nas montanhas do Afeganistão. Isolados e rodeados por talibãs, são forçados a tomar uma decisão difícil...

programme.title: O Livro de Eli
programme.desc: Um guerreiro solitário, Eli, anda por uma terra pós-apocalíptica e tenta completar uma missão que não entende muito bem. Na sua posse, Eli tem o último exemplar de um livro que guarda com a própria vida, pois nele reside a única esperança no futuro.

programme.title: Imparável
programme.desc: Frank é um engenheiro veterano de uma companhia ferroviária prestes a ser dispensado. Will é um maquinista recém-contratado, pouco motivado mas com noção do dever. Os seus destinos cruzam-se quando um comboio cheio de combustível e gás venenoso se dirige, desgovernado, a uma cidade.

Há alguns séculos, os Maias deixaram uma data para o fim do mundo. Os numerólogos encontraram padrões que preveem esta catástrofe, os geólogos dizem que a Terra vai dar de si e nem mesmo os cientistas do Governo podem negar o cataclismo que nos espera em 2012. Em 2012, saberemos: nós fomos avisados.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: Jane é uma tímida governanta que consegue conquistar o frio coração do seu patrão. Mas a descoberta de um terrível segredo que ele esconde ameaça a felicidade de Jane.

programme.title: Dá Tempo ao Tempo
programme.desc: Aos 21 anos, Tim Lake descobre que consegue viajar no tempo, o que lhe permite alterar o que acontece ou aconteceu na sua vida. Mas rapidamente conclui que a sua habilidade única não o pode salvar das mágoas, amores e dissabores que afetam todas as pessoas e famílias, em todo o lado.

programme.title: Pesadelo em Férias
programme.desc: Kevin é um médico que tenta reparar os danos que a sua carreira provocou na vida pessoal e leva toda a família para umas férias nas Caraíbas. Chegados ao resort, um passeio de barco deixa a família numa ilha deserta, sem comunicações, comida ou água.

programme.title: Adeus Índia
programme.desc: Lord Mountbatten é designado último vice-rei da Índia, com a missão de supervisionar a transição da Índia para a independência. Apesar do esforço para simplificar o processo, é envolvido num jogo político que torna a tarefa quase impossível.

programme.title: Ponto de Mira
programme.desc: O presidente dos Estados Unidos viaja até Salamanca para dar uma conferência. Durante o evento, alguém o tenta matar. A história é contada por oito testemunhas, que relatam oito versões diferentes da mesma situação.

programme.title: Armadas e Perigosas
programme.desc: Sarah Ashburn é uma agente do FBI, metódica e arrogante, e Shannon Mullins uma detetive de Boston pouco convencional, desbocada e temperamental. Quando têm de unir forças para capturar um poderoso barão da droga, irão enfrentar não só uma poderosa rede de crime, mas terão de lutar corpo a corpo.

programme.title: Assim Nasce uma Estrela
programme.desc: Jackson Maine é um músico consagrado que descobre e se apaixona por Ally, uma cantora que já tinha desistido de realizar o seu sonho. Mas enquanto a carreira de Ally descola, Jack luta contra os seus demónios e a relação entre os dois deteriora-se.

programme.title: Quiz Show
programme.desc: As incidências de dois concorrentes que disputam elevados prémios monetários e projeções mediáticas num concurso televisivo de grande audiência.

programme.title: Hell Or High Water - Custe o Que Custar
programme.desc: No Oeste americano, dois irmãos, Toby e Tanner Howard, planeiam um último roubo à sucursal do banco que está a penhorar a propriedade da família. Mas no seu caminho aparece um incansável Ranger texano, em busca de um último triunfo antes da reforma...

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

programme.title: Lapso Temporal
programme.desc: Três jovens, colegas de quarto, descobrem o cadáver do seu vizinho cientista. Ao inspecionarem a sua casa, o grupo depara-se com uma máquina misteriosa, que tira fotografias 24 horas no futuro, e decidem usá-la para ganho pessoal.

programme.title: Invasão Mundial: Batalha Los Angeles
programme.desc: Na base militar de Camp Pendleton, em Los Angeles, um grupo de fuzileiros é chamado para uma missão urgente de resgate de civis na zona costeira de Santa Mónica, ameaçada por uma violenta chuva de meteoritos. Porém, o que parecia uma luta contra os elementos transforma-se em algo aterrador.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

programme.title: San Andreas Mega Quake
programme.desc: Um grupo de cientista tenta provocar um curto-circuito, recorrendo a um vulcão, de modo a provocar um terramoto massivo capaz de afundar a Califórnia. A tarefa revela-se urgente quando o pânico fica instalado no estado.

Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Um vírus é libertado numa empresa secreta que faz investigação genética e os trabalhadores são fechados lá dentro, o que os condena à morte. Uma força militar é enviada para conter o vírus, mas descobre que os trabalhadores não estão, na realidade, mortos: transformaram-se em zombies famintos.

programme.title: Resident Evil 3 - Extinção
programme.desc: Las Vegas pressupõe diversão e sol. E pelo menos ainda há sol. À exceção de alguns monumentos em ruínas, parece-se muito ao deserto, e a todo o país. As multidões são zombies que se alimentam de carne humana. Alice e a sua equipa enfrentam o Mal com um objetivo: converter os mortos-vivos em mortos!

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Norberto Barba, Terrence O'Hara, Eric Laneuville, Aaron Lipstadt, Peter Werner
